Package com.composum.sling.core.util

Class TagFilteringWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.FilterWriter
        • com.composum.sling.core.util.TagFilteringWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
    public class TagFilteringWriter
extends FilterWriter
    a filter reader implementation to filter out HTML tags from the base reader

    • Constructor Detail

      • TagFilteringWriter

        public TagFilteringWriter​(@NotNull
                          @NotNull Writer writer,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull String[] toRename,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull String[] toStrip,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull String[] toDrop,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull String[] autoClose)
        Creates a tag filtering reader to filter out the tags configured as sets of tag names
        Parameters:
        in - the reader to filter during read
        toRename - the set of tag names which should be kept but renamed (e.g. 'html:div' to keep the root)
        toStrip - the set of tag names to 'stripe' - remove the tags around and keep the body of the tags
        toDrop - the set of tag names to 'drop' - remove the tags including their body
        autoClose - the set of tag names to close automatically

      • TagFilteringWriter
